title: x/cmd/gomobile: don't override -tags
body:
Regardless of the tags flags, it is overridden by -tags=ios for -target=ios.

```
$ gomobile build -tags="lldb" -target=ios -x .
...
GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm GOARM=7 \
CC=/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/clang \ 
CXX=/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/clang \ CGO_CFLAGS=-isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS8.3.sdk -arch armv7 \
CGO_LDFLAGS=-isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS8.3.sdk -arch armv7 \
CGO_ENABLED=1 \
go build -p=8 -pkgdir=$GOMOBILE/pkg_darwin_arm -tags="lldb" -x -tags=ios -o=$WORK/arm golang.org/x/mobile/example/audio
```
